name: 伽利略·伽利莱
bio_short: 意大利天文学家、物理学家和工程师。他因开创性的天文观测和对运动学的研究，被誉为“观测天文学之父”和“现代科学之父”。
bio_short_en: An Italian astronomer, physicist and engineer. His pioneering astronomical observations and studies of motion have earned him the titles 'father of observational astronomy' and 'father of modern science'.
